virtual const iview::CScreenTransform& iview::ILogicalCoords::GetLogToScreenTransform ( ) const [pure virtual]

Get a direct transformation from logical units to screen pixels.

Implemented in iview::CViewBase, and iview::CShapeControl.

virtual const i2d::CAffine2d& iview::ILogicalCoords::GetLogToViewTransform ( ) const [pure virtual]

Get logical units to view transformation.

This transformation converts logical units to view coordinate system. Please note, that it is only affine transformation, not a calibration. You can use it as a calibration only, when linear transformation is enough. To get transformation to convert logical units to screen pixel, use GetLogToScreenTransform().

Implemented in iview::CViewBase, and iview::CShapeControl.
